article_title: Editorial: For Republicans, Kasich is only candidate with record of leadership, temperament to be president
article_text: The most important thing for this legislature to think about: Put yourself in somebody else’s shoes," he said at the time. "Put yourself in the shoes of a mother and a father of an adult child that is struggling. Walk in somebody else’s moccasins. Understand that poverty is real."

article_metadata.description: Even when he was among a crowded field of 17 Republican presidential candidates, Ohio Gov. John Kasich stood out as the most capable and qualified leader.
article_metadata.author: Repository Editorial Board
